description: Returns information about a training dataset.

parameters.name: trainingDatasetArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the training dataset that you are interested in.

nested_items.name: createTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the training dataset was created.

nested_items.name: updateTime
nested_items.description: The most recent time at which the training dataset was updated.

nested_items.name: trainingDatasetArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the training dataset.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the training dataset.

nested_items.name: trainingData
nested_items.description: Metadata about the requested training data.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: What type of information is found in the dataset.

nested_items.name: inputConfig
nested_items.description: A DatasetInputConfig object that defines the data source and schema mapping.

nested_items.name: schema
nested_items.description: The schema information for the training data.

nested_items.name: columnName
nested_items.description: The name of a column.

nested_items.name: columnTypes
nested_items.description: The data type of column.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: dataSource
nested_items.description: A DataSource object that specifies the Glue data source for the training data.

nested_items.name: glueDataSource
nested_items.description: A GlueDataSource object that defines the catalog ID, database name, and table name for the training data.

nested_items.name: tableName
nested_items.description: The Glue table that contains the training data.

nested_items.name: databaseName
nested_items.description: The Glue database that contains the training data.

nested_items.name: catalogId
nested_items.description: The Glue catalog that contains the training data.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the training dataset.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The IAM role used to read the training data.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the training dataset.
